Title: Tenkuu Senki Shurato: Sousei e no Anto
Description:
['This is the continuation of the TV series. The battle for the celestial sphere is over. Gai and Shurato have been erased from history. However, another danger is coming ahead, and the eight guardians are sent back to Earth to investigate.
